verses.verse: My God <WH410>, my God <WH410>, why have you forsaken <WH5800> me <WH7350>? why are you so far from helping <WH3444> me <WH1697>, and from the words of my roaring <WH7581>?
O my God <WH430>, I cry <WH7121> in the daytime <WH3119>, but you hear <WH6030> not <WH3915>; and in the night season, and am not silent <WH1747>.
But you are holy <WH6918>, O you that inhabit <WH3427> the praises <WH8416> of Israel <WH3478>.
Our fathers <WH1> trusted <WH982> in you <WH982>: they trusted, and you did deliver them <WH6403>.
They cried <WH2199> unto you <WH4422>, and were delivered: they trusted <WH982> in you <WH954>, and were not confounded.
But I am a worm <WH8438>, and no man <WH376>; a reproach <WH2781> of men <WH120>, and despised <WH959> of the people <WH5971>.
All they that see <WH7200> me laugh me to scorn <WH3932>: they shoot out <WH6358> the lip <WH8193>, they shake <WH5128> the head <WH7218>, saying,
He trusted <WH1556> on the Lord <WH3068> that he would deliver <WH6403> him <WH5337>: let him deliver him <WH2654>, seeing he delighted in him.
But you are he that took <WH1518> me out of the womb <WH990>: you did make me hope <WH982> when I was upon my mother <WH517>'s breasts <WH7699>.
I was cast <WH7993> upon you from the womb <WH7358>: you are my God <WH410> from my mother <WH517>'s belly <WH990>.
Be not far <WH7368> from me <WH6869>; for trouble is near <WH7138>; for there is none to help <WH5826>.
Many <WH7227> bulls <WH6499> have surrounded <WH5437> me <WH47>: strong bulls of Bashan <WH1316> have beset me round <WH3803>.
They gaped <WH6475> upon me with their mouths <WH6310>, as a ravening <WH2963> and a roaring <WH7580> lion <WH738>.

I am poured out <WH8210> like water <WH4325>, and all my bones <WH6106> are out of joint <WH6504>: my heart <WH3820> is like wax <WH1749>; it is melted <WH4549> in the middle <WH8432> of my bowels <WH4578>.

My strength <WH3581> is dried up <WH3001> like a potsherd <WH2789>; and my tongue <WH3956> cleaves <WH1692> to my jaws <WH4455>; and you have brought <WH8239> me into the dust <WH6083> of death <WH4194>.
For dogs <WH3611> have surrounded <WH5437> me <WH5712>: the assembly of the wicked <WH7489> have enclosed <WH5362> me <WH3738>: they pierced my hands <WH3027> and my feet <WH7272>.
I may tell <WH5608> all my bones <WH6106>: they look <WH5027> and stare upon me <WH7200>.
They part <WH2505> my garments <WH899> among them <WH5307>, and cast lots <WH1486> upon my vesture <WH3830>.
But be not you far <WH7368> from me <WH3068>, O Lord: O my strength <WH360>, haste <WH2363> you to help me <WH5833>.
Deliver <WH5337> my soul <WH5315> from the sword <WH2719>; my darling <WH3173> from the power <WH3027> of the dog <WH3611>.
Save <WH3467> me from the lion <WH738>'s mouth <WH6310>: for you have heard <WH6030> me from the horns <WH7161> of the unicorns <WH7214>.
I will declare <WH5608> your name <WH8034> unto my brothers <WH251>: in the middle <WH8432> of the congregation <WH6951> will I praise you <WH1984>.
You that fear <WH3373> the Lord <WH3068>, praise <WH1984> him <WH2233>; all you the seed of Jacob <WH3290>, glorify <WH3513> him <WH1481>; and fear him <WH2233>, all you the seed of Israel <WH3478>.

For he has not despised <WH959> nor abhorred <WH8262> the affliction <WH6039> of the afflicted <WH6041>; neither has he hid <WH5641> his face <WH6440> from him <WH7768>; but when he cried unto him <WH8085>, he heard.
My praise <WH8416> shall be of you in the great <WH7227> congregation <WH6951>: I will pay <WH7999> my vows <WH5088> before them that fear him <WH3373>.
The meek <WH6035> shall eat <WH398> and be satisfied <WH7646>: they shall praise <WH1984> the Lord <WH3068> that seek <WH1875> him <WH3824>: your heart shall live <WH2421> for ever <WH5703>.

All the ends <WH657> of the world <WH776> shall remember <WH2142> and turn <WH7725> unto the Lord <WH3068>: and all the kindreds <WH4940> of the nations <WH1471> shall worship <WH7812> before you <WH6440>.
For the kingdom <WH4410> is the Lord <WH3068>'s: and he is the governor <WH4910> among the nations <WH1471>.

All they that be fat <WH1879> upon earth <WH776> shall eat <WH398> and worship <WH7812>: all they that go down <WH3381> to the dust <WH6083> shall bow <WH3766> before <WH6440> him <WH2421>: and none can keep alive his own soul <WH5315>.
A seed <WH2233> shall serve <WH5647> him <WH5608>; it shall be accounted to the Lord <WH136> for a generation <WH1755>.
They shall come <WH935>, and shall declare <WH5046> his righteousness <WH6666> unto a people <WH5971> that shall be born <WH3205>, that he has done this <WH6213>.
